course_title: Fresh Sem: Poli Sci: 2020 Elec:Future of Amer. Pol.
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 12 / Seats Avail: 1Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Freshmen Seminar - Limited to First Year Students Only)


This course will be taught entirely online and will meet synchronously both days.


This course will provide an in-depth examination of the remarkable 2020 election in the United States.  Topics to be covered include political polarization, the rise of Donald Trump, the Trump presidency, the Democratic nomination contest, the impact of the coronavirus pandemic, racial justice protests, the election results and the outlook for the first two years of the Biden presidency.  Students will submit brief thought papers on weekly reading assignments write and a longer research paper due at the end of the semester.
course_description: For first-year students only. Entry level seminar focusing on a specific topic. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
